Package units

The units module is used to represent a “game piece” from the RoboSports board game.

See: Description

    A test unit that was described the the testing plan, used for testing various methods throughout the system
    Unit

    UnitFactory
    This Unit Factory provides a convenience for getting Units of the proper type.

Package units Description

The units module is used to represent a “game piece” from the RoboSports board game. Each Unit shares many fields, including healthLeft, health, attack, moves, movesLeft, range, position, and direction as integers. It also has fields myTeam as a string and Image for a graphic. Additionally, each unit will have methods to shoot, move, turn, check, scan,identify as well as initializers for Stats,health, and movement.
